metadata.title: Large-Scale variability of water thermodynamic structure in the Northwestern Pacific Ocean.
metadata.description: Thermodynamic water structure in the Northwestern Pacific is studied using deep sea observations.  There are examined variability of the North Subtropic Gyre water transportation, heat storage of the baroclinic layer and  mean location of the Kuroshio front.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To show Large-Scale variability of water thermodynamic structure in the Northwestern Pacific Ocean.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
